Interface CommonSettlement<T extends Tax,M extends CommonMonetarySummation>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Settlement, SpecifiedSettlement

    public interface CommonSettlement<T extends Tax,M extends CommonMonetarySummation>
extends java.io.Serializable

    The Trade Settlement

    Contains payment related information.
